_description: GotH — Convert guitar tablature to harmonica tabs online. Free, supports multiple keys and reed counts.
hero_subtitle: Convert guitar tabs to harmonica tabs in seconds
hero_desc: GotH is a free, fast and simple tool that helps you convert guitar tablature to harmonica. It includes advanced options for different types of harmonicas and chords.
feature_1_desc: Convert tabs in real-time without waiting
feature_2_desc: Supports bends, overblows and other special notes
feature_3_desc: Choose harmonica key, number of frets and more
step_1_desc: Select your harmonica key and adjust fretboard preferences
step_2_desc: Enter notes by clicking on guitar fretboard fields
step_3_desc: Get guitar tabs and harmonica tablatures in real-time
faq_1_a: GotH is completely free and open source. There are no hidden costs or subscriptions.
faq_2_q: Do I need to create an account?
faq_2_a: No, no account is required. GotH runs on your device without storing data on servers.
faq_3_a: All diatonic harmonicas from C to F# are supported. The selection is available in the editor.
faq_4_a: Yes, GotH is a progressive web app (PWA) and can be used offline.
cta_desc: Click below and open the editor with full features
clear_modal_body: Are you sure you want to delete the entire tab?
